This top hugs your curves in all the right ways. Just keep in mind that it is very low-cut. That being said, I love how it shapes the chest. I think it looks best on people with a bigger bust. Even without a bra it looks so good. I’d probably wear some sticky cups under it. The under-bust detailing is flattering. Size S is perfect on me. It’s tight but comfortable. Reoria strikes again! Double layer is great, color is as described, and it fits exactly as expected. Soft and snug. It actually works perfect with a standard t-shirt bra as well which is lucky, I didn't need a deep-v one!
